Articles.Content: I've found I can query and change precision control mode by peeking / poking 'FlightInputHandler.fetch.precisionMode'. When I supply input after switch the mode programmatically, everything functionally works. However, the needles on the UI overlay do not change color (they remain whichever color they were). Can anyone point me at the object that I need to nudge to tell it to update those colors?

foreach ( Renderer renderer  in FlightInputHandler.inputGaugeRenderers)	renderer.material.color = (!FlightInputHandler.precisionMode) ? XKCDColors.Orange : XKCDColors.BrightCyan;

Have fun with alternate colors ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Has anyone found the solution for 1.1?
